content.rendered:
Photo by Gerrie van der Walt on Unsplash

New theme release from Restored 316 and a new theme sneak peek from StudioPress.

Themes

Lauren Gaige at Restored 316 launches a new theme for bloggers, Captivating.

We are so excited to introduce our new theme Captivating, A WordPress theme built for bloggers. https://t.co/rfQxIP7WWn #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/1Ci9PeZSCH

— Lauren Gaige (@restored316) August 9, 2017

Rafal Tomal gives a sneak peek at the latest theme in works from StudioPress (design by Lauren Mancke).

Here's a sneak preview at the new #genesiswp theme we're working on at @StudioPress: https://t.co/LghLlkqkbX

— Rafal Tomal (@RafalTomal) August 11, 2017

And finally…

If you want to learn CSS Grid but don’t know where to start you might want to try Grid Garden (h/t Sridhar).

I just beat Grid Garden, a game for learning CSS grid layout! https://t.co/1MljxTcWMF via @playcodepip

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) August 8, 2017

excerpt.rendered: New theme release from Restored 316 and a new theme sneak peek from StudioPress.
